name: com.fuzzphyte.utility
description: FP Utility is a collection of useful utilities for Unity that are generally base classes for other repositories to inherit/utilize.

samples.description: Includes some examples of the different ScriptableObject based use cases and other misc. scripts for how you can utilize some of these base classes. Audio Example for ramping audio in and out as well. Spline Timeline follower example here as well.
Showcasing a simple custom shader effect to transition between two textures on a single material.
Native iOS I/O: Save .json, Open .md, and save .wav files to the iOS device
Base URP settings for Mesh/Vertex Render Features
URP Profiles for URP FP Render Environments
